name: Bullet Dancer Reload
summary: You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata.
description:
You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata. You Strike with a simple firearm, and then Interact to reload that same firearm. You don't need a free hand to reload your simple firearm in this way.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Flourish: Flourish actions are actions that require too much exertion to perform a large number in a row. You can use only 1 action with the flourish trait per turn.
